channel.title: Revision control on DI Herbert Mühlburger
channel.description: Recent content in Revision control on DI Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: Video Introduction to GIT Version Control by Scott Chacon of GitHub
item.description: The following talk, given by Scott Chacon of GitHub, gives a very good introduction to the version control system GIT and its usage. This is by far the best introduction that I have found so far. (via Marakana)
